First phrase that a user reads on our we.home.introduction.catchphrase: Let everyone know what you are watching and listening to!

Features section subheading.home.cards.subheading: These cards will show you our main features to help you understand what PreMiD can do!

Extension system description.home.cards.extensionsystem.description: Our extension has its own extensions! Sounds very strange but it allows you to install different presences for your lovely services!

Media Controls card description.home.cards.mediacontrols.desciption: Most of our presences provide support for Media Controls. You can skip & pause tracks while using other applications.

Tab Priority card description.home.cards.tabpriority.description: When changing between tabs, our extensions prioritizes the active one.

Open Source card description.home.cards.opensource.description: You noticed a bug or just want to improve our code? Then you have the opportunity to contribute to our GitHub project.
